channel.title: Data on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Google Data Fusion
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Data Fusion is a fully managed, cloud-native data integration service that enables users to efficiently build and manage ETL/ELT data pipelines.

item.title: Google Dataproc
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Google Dataproc is a fast and easy-to-use, fully managed cloud service for running Apache Spark and Hadoop workloads. It allows users to process and analyze large-scale data efficiently and at scale.

item.title: Managing Dataflow And Sql Database With Concurrency Control
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Some of us had built a game, while others were familiar with e-commerce platforms, D-apps, or even all of these types of applications, and more.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Tom Nguyen Remote Working At Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A catch-up with Tom - our Data Lead, and hear how remote working has fit him perfectly. Tom is one of our core contributors of Dwarves Brainery, and he’ll be playing as a key mentor for our upcoming Apprenticeship.
